hero.description: I develop React Applications for web and mobile, as well as 3D visuals and user interfaces.

about.description: I'm a frontend developer since 2017. This protfolio resumes my technical knowledge, adquired throught these years. This app uses frameworks like React Vite, Typescript, Node.js, and Three.js. I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with clients to create edfficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!
